name: eventNu
tag_list: event, tickets, india, internet, ecommerce, parties, seminars, conference, meetup
overview:
eventNu.com is a premium event portal in India which is allows their users to find the best of the events happening around them.

Its a great online companion tool for all small and medium event organizers who want to reach to masses without spending on huge infrastructure or setup cost. They can list their events for free, create buzz by leveraging integration with several social media platforms, measure success rates as well.

Global event managers doing their events in India considers eventNu.com as a unique service provider, as they can handle online transactions in Indian rupees by virtue of their association with top Indian banks, saving money for both organizers and attendees.
